snippet: The gala, which raised $3.6 million, was hosted by Eva Chow and Leonardo DiCaprio, and honored Robert Irwin and Kathryn Bigelow....
abstract: Celebrities wear flamboyant creations designed by Gucci creative director Alessandro Michele to label's annual benefit for Los Angeles County Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: The gala, which raised $3.6 million, was hosted by Eva Chow and Leonardo DiCaprio, and honored Robert Irwin and Kathryn Bigelow.

headline.print_headline: Stars of Two Worlds, Shining Together
headline.main: Brie Larson, Salma Hayek and Gwyneth Paltrow at Lacma’s Art & Film Gala

keywords.value: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
